fields.name: Mystical Brew Recipe:
fields.value:
Onions, carrots, garlic, olive oil, spinach, chicken bouillon, fresh parsley.
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player and choose either their attack value, defense value or ability to place them into your soup.
- Make a player consume your soup, and learn their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Attack/defense values in a soup will override the taster's current values. Any player that has an attack value above none can make an attack, and attacking abilities will automatically give a player basic attack if they have none.
- Abilities in a soup will be added onto whatever abilities the taster already has.
- You may only use one of your abilities per night.
- You may target yourself.
- With the Necronomicon, you may choose to attack players when using one of your abilities, this resolves after performing your ability.
